name: Maruti Eeco
description: The price of Maruti Eeco, a 5 seater Minivan, ranges from Rs. 5.32  - 6.58 Lakh. It is available in 4 variants, with an engine of 1197 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Manual. Eeco comes with 2 airbags. Maruti Eeco is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 20 kmpl for Eeco.

variants.variant_name: Eeco 5 STR STD 1197 cc, Petrol, Manual, 80 bhp
Eeco 7 STR STD 1197 cc, Petrol, Manual, 80 bhp
Eeco 5 STR AC 1197 cc, Petrol, Manual, 80 bhp
Eeco 5 STR AC CNG 1197 cc, CNG, Manual, 71 bhp
